transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ha, Dinesh ji, hello.
Customer: Dinesh ji, mai IndiaMART se baat kar raha hu.
Executive: Ha.
Customer: Pravesh ka Dinesh baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se Pravesh. Kaise hai?
Customer: Bas badhiya boliye.
Executive: Thik hai. Aapka outstanding amount jo last wala tha aapne kaha clear ho gaya right?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ab mujhe finally update kar kya karna hai ispe kyuki aap service aapko chalani hai ya nahi chalani hai mujhe please update dijiye.
Customer: Service aisa hi chalega?
Executive: Ji?
Customer: Aisa hi chalega.
Executive: Service to aisa hi chalega matlab kis tarah se bata rahe hai aap sara kuch discussion me kar diya aapne.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ki kis tarike se kya hai kaise hai na. Subscription aisa hi matlab isi tarike se flow rahega jo bhi flow aa raha hai aapko. Thik hai. Improvement further hote rahenge.
Customer: Improvement to nahi hua na kya hua do mahina ho gaya par usme kya kuch changes aaya nahi hai aisa hi rahega to nahi chahiye barabar aap bologe mahina bhar me kuch improvement aayega to rakhna hai baki close kar do aap.
Executive: Dekhiye to closing to mai to abhi kahunga agar aap thoda sa wait karna chah rahe hai 30 din 25 din to aap please continue rakha dijiye fir hai na.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Aur further jab bhi aap jaisa bolenge. Mai to yahi kahunga ki aap isko one month aur continue kijiye hai na. Aur agar aap baad me bhi aapko lagta hai aisa ki matlab is tarike se aapko requirement nahi dikh raha hai. Aur aapko lagta hai ki service ke against thi. To hum log aap jaisa kahenge waisa hum log yaha pe process kar denge. Thik hai abhi bhi mai ready hu. Baad me bhi mai ready rahunga aap jaisa bolenge thik hai.
Customer: To aap bataiye isme koi changes nahi hue kya?
Executive: Sir changes in the sense dekho abhi aapko do mahina aapne use kiya thik hai aapko koi bhi changes nahi lage service me?
Customer: Nahi nahi.
Executive: Acha sir pehle aap 60 lead pe kam karte the abhi aap just triple lead pe kam kar rahe hai to aapko fark nahi aaya?
Customer: Fark to lead badh gaya par kam ka to koi lead aa hi nahi raha hai na aisa mai bol raha hu samjhe aap.
Executive: Ye jo consumption hai ye kam ke lead nahi the.
Customer: Nahi wo usme value usse dekho na kitne kitne value ka maine purchase kar liya hua hai. Barabar kya keh rahe hai?
Executive: Are jo value aata hai na value.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Wo dekho na 20 rupya 30 rupya 40 rupya mai bola aaj ye purchase karega kuch aage nahi aayega nahi aayega bas abhi to mai thak gaya koi usme dikhta nahi hai. Mai aapko samjh raha hu agar aap bolenge to thik hai hum log hum isi me usko waise bhi aapka basic renewal aayega ek aad mahine me karna hai hai na. To agar aap bolte ho to matlab amount aapko process karwa denge agar aap bologe to aisa kuch nahi hai.
Customer: Thik hai thoda Pravesh se bolo na mujhe call kare barabar.
Executive: Pravesh actually abhi aaj chutti pe hai samajh rahe hai. To isliye maine call kiya hai aapne video meeting ka bhi request dal diya hai. Aur usse pehle bhi aapne 96 se call kiya tha. To aap batao mujhe kis tarike se hai aap jaisa update denge waisa kar denge aisi koi baat nahi hai.
Customer: Ek bar Pravesh se baat karo uske baad me decision mera batata hu barabar.
Executive: Pravesh se baat karao aapki Pravesh available nahi hai aaj.
Customer: Kya?
Executive: Pravesh available nahi hai to mai unse baat kara du aapki jinse Ranjit ji se baat kara du.
Customer: Kis se?
Executive: Ranjit ji se baat kara du ye business manager hai.
Customer: Uska to mere ko pehchan nahi hai.
Executive: Wo mere bhi senior hai wo.
Customer: Acha.
Executive: Baat kara du aapki?
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ha. Pravesh se baat karo aisa rahega.
Customer: Chalo mai Pravesh ko koshish karta hu ki panch das minute aapke baat kar le hai na try karta hu. Thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants improvement in lead quality or closure.

- Dissatisfied with the value of purchased leads.

- Wants to speak with Pravesh.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to process refund if dissatisfied.

- Executive mentioned Pravesh is on leave.

- Offered to connect with Ranjit, a business manager.

- Executive will try to connect with Pravesh.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will try to connect with Pravesh.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, refund, subscription, renewal
